text: I'm also curious if anyone has had luck running ABMs on the GPU, it seems like there's too much branching for it to be efficient but I am not sure.

elements.text: I'm also curious if anyone has had luck running ABMs on the GPU, it seems like there's too much branching for it to be efficient but I am not sure.

text: In general graph based code doesn't work on GPU well

elements.text: In general graph based code doesn't work on GPU well

text: Hm why is that? sparse multiply is slow?

elements.text: Hm why is that? sparse multiply is slow?

text: some sparse stuff (like matmul) works decently on gpu. In general, though many graph algorithms are full of unpredictable scalar indexing
